tool_description: It is some simple API for fetch Virtual Currency  Data
title: Virtual Currency

api_list.name: Get a Currency Data By Name
api_list.description: This endpoint will get a currency data by name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://virtual-currency.p.rapidapi.com/name/{name}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "virtual-currency.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get A Currency Data By Rank

api_list.name: Get All Currency Data
api_list.description: This Endponit will Get All Currency Data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://virtual-currency.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "virtual-currency.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
